programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space

programme.title: Part 5

programme.title: Part 6

programme.title: Part 7
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E07, The Doctor has escaped the doomed, parallel Earth and has returned to his own world where he attempts to put a halt to the drilling project.

The Keller Machine breaks free of the Doctor's restraining device and the Doctor has no choice but to turn the parasite against the Master.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daemons, S01E01, The Doctor tries to prevent Professor Horner from breaking into an ancient barrow near the village of Devil’s End. Posing as the village vicar, the Master summons dark forces.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daemons, S01E02, Devil’s End is sealed off from the outside world by a heat barrier. The Doctor and Jo return to the barrow where they are confronted by the gargoyle, Bok.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daemons, S01E03, The Doctor attempts to help the Brigadier penetrate the heat barrier but is attacked by the Master’s servant in a helicopter. The Master prepares to summon the Daemon Azal.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daemons, S01E04, The Doctor is captured by the villagers who are under the Master’s control. Jo goes to the church to prevent the Master from summoning Azal for the final time but is too late.

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daemons, S01E05, UNIT have penetrated the heat barrier and launch an attack on the gargoyle, Bok. In the cavern, the Daemon Azal confronts the Doctor and the Master to decide the fate of mankind.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks, S01E01, When Sir Reginald Styles claims to have seen a ghost, UNIT is called in. The Doctor and Jo spend the night at Styles' house and become the target of an assassin.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks, S01E02, As captive of the guerrillas, the Doctor discovers they intend to change history. Jo is transported to the 22nd Century where she unwittingly gives vital information to the Daleks.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks, S01E03, The Doctor arrives in a bleak future where Earth is ruled by the Daleks and mankind is enslaved. Rescuing Jo, the two escape but the brutish Ogrons are in pursuit.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks, S01E04, The Controller betrays the Daleks and is exterminated. The Daleks travel back in time to the 20th Century to ensure that the peace conference fails.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Curse of Peladon, S01E01, The planet Peladon is hoping to join the Galactic Federation. But King Peladon’s Chancellor has been murdered and it seems that the legendary royal beast, Aggedor is to blame.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Curse of Peladon, S01E02, The work of the committee is hampered by sabotage, fear, and suspicion. The Doctor knows the Ice Warriors of old and believes that they may be the guilty party.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Curse of Peladon, S01E03, The Doctor is sentenced to a fight to the death in the pit with the King’s champion, Grun. But the saboteur and killer is still at large.

programme.title: Episode: 6
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S12E06, This episode includes: Death Row Mom, Pts. 1 & 2, Mothman and Bonnie & Clyde 2001 & UD.
Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S06E10, This episode includes: Elks Club Murder, Where's Jo?, Smoker Car Baby & UD and Mandy & Punky & UD.

programme.title: Episode: 3
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S06E03, This episode includes: Anastasia (Pts. 1, 2 & 3) & UD, Jail Family & UD and Killer Boyfriend & UD.

programme.title: Episode: 5
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S11E05, This episode includes: Carson Prince & UD, Fake Dr. Fraud & UD, Hero Molester & UD and Missing Theatre Student & UD.

programme.title: Episode: 2
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S02E02, This episode includes: Realtor Murder, Miracle Cross, Update: Robbinghood and Nudist Fraud.

programme.title: Episode: 18
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S01E18, This episode includes: Mickey Thompson & UD, Hairy Escape & UD, Bigfoot, Rainy Day and Maine Petition & UD.

programme.title: Episode: 4
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S06E04, This episode includes: Zel's Odyssey (Pts. 1 & 2), Wally's Hidden River, UD: DJ Death and Looking for Christopher & UD.

programme.title: Episode: 21
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S01E21, This episode includes: Li'l Miss & UD, Lost Dutchman's Mine Pts. 1 & 2 and Kiss of Death.

programme.title: Episode: 20
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S07E20, This episode includes: Mystery Hum, UD: School Bus Family, Car Crash Thank You & UD, Dial's Escape & UD and Taking a Dive & UD.

programme.title: Episode: 10
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S07E10, This episode includes: Cyril Wecht, Psychic Family Roots, Search for Kristi and Baby Brother Lost & UD.

programme.title: Episode: 11
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S11E11, This episode includes: The Other Intern & UD, Artist for the Persecution, Waag, the Dog & UD and Patti's Little Girls & UD.

programme.title: Episode: 2
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S04E02, This episode includes: John Wilkes Booth (Pts. 1 & 2), Identical Twins and Man Who Never Was & UD.

programme.title: Episode: 11
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S03E11, This episode includes: Pix of the Dead, Johnny Lee Wilson (Pts. 1 & 2 + UD) and Totally Exhausted.

programme.title: Episode: 7
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S02E07, This episode includes: Christmas Party Murder, Update: Nudist Fraud, Gypsy Fraud, Drummond's Dollars & UD and Coma Recovery.
Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S11E10, This episode includes: Heather Tallchief & UD, Burned Evidence, Survivor and Niqui Bride-to-Be.

programme.title: Episode: 7
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S04E07, This episode includes: St. James' Ghost, Ghostly Attraction, Where Is She Now? and Calling Dr. Fraud & UD

programme.title: Episode: 20
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S03E20, This episode includes: Edgar Cayce, Crystal and War of the Depues & UD.

programme.title: Death of a Hero
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E04, A fire in January 2007 claims the life of WWII vet Bennie Angelo. A closer look at the crime scene reveals Bennie was dead before the fire, bumping an arson case up to homicide.

programme.title: The Clock Strikes Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E16, When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years for advancements in forensic science to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E24, Just two years into their marriage, Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E01, After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E04, In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2004, Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E10, In 1984, a 15-year-old girl is found murdered in her grandparents' home. For decades, a stalled investigation only fuels the town rumor mill, pointing an accusing finger at her 13-year-old sister.

programme.title: Devil At The Door
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E02, When 36-year-old computer programmer Lisa Valdez fails to show up for work, her apartment manager finds her brutally murdered. Detectives ask, could she be the victim of a brutal serial killer? Or was Lisa murdered by someone she knew?

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Dark Angel
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E14, 13 days after Pam Pitts disappears in 1988 her charred body is found at a popular hangout spot in the Arizona desert. When a second victim is discovered in a mineshaft, detectives suspect the killer may have known them both.

programme.title: Queen of the Ozarks
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E21, In June 1985, a 20-year-old "Sucker Day" Festival Queen is found brutalized. The small community of Nixa, Missouri, is certain her blood is on the hands of a local wealthy businessman, but after 25 years DNA reveals the true killer.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Killer in the Storm
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E01, In the heart of Cajun country, young mother Brenda DuPont is found murdered in her home in May 1988. The initial investigation sputters and turns cold, but her sister Linda vows to solve her murder.

programme.title: Werewolf
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Werewolf, S05E28, After digging up strange bones, a man becomes a werewolf.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: A Date With Your Family
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E19, Learn the many ways you've acted improperly during family dinners in this 1950s short.

programme.title: The Sword And The Dragon
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Sword And The Dragon, S06E17, A Russian hero plots an invasion against the Mongols in The Sword and the Dragon. Mike and the Bots create their own topical comedy show, reenact the table cloth scene from the movie, and try their hand at playing Dungeons and Dragons.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Junior Rodeo Daredevils
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E16, A prank gone wrong leads to children taking on a dangerous new sport.
The Giant Gila Monster, 20020612000000 +0000, A hit-and-run victim is brought back from the dead by a voodoo doctor, and then seeks revenge.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Crew
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E09, In part two of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the team discuss the Satellite of Love crew.

programme.title: Monster A-Go-Go
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Monster A-Go-Go, S04E21, The search for an astronaut on an alien planet.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K Turkey Day!
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K, S01E21, A compilation of new introductions for the infamous Turkey Day marathon as well as a nostalgic look back on the Comedy Central fan-favorite marathon of Mystery Science Theater.

MST3K: Bride Of The Monster, 19930123000000 +0000, Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo, who conduct heinous experiments on human victims in an effort to create a race of atomic super-beings.

programme.title: Are You Ready for Marriage?
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E02, A high school senior named Sue and her boyfriend want to get married right after Sue graduates. A marriage counselor discourages the young couple from entering into a hasty marriage.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 2: Death Stalks The Highways
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E11, Bela Lugosi stars as Dr. Zorka, inventor of a lethal mechanical spider.
MST3K: Mad Monster, 19891202000000 +0000, Things get hairy on the Satellite of Love thanks to the lupine antics of The Mad Monster (1942) and the second chapter of Radar Men from the Moon (1952).

MST3K: Robot Monster: MST3K: Robot Monster, 19891223080000 +0000, The guys watch a post-apocalyptic film about aliens and robots, riff on two more installments of "Radar Men from the Moon", and try to understand surrealism.
MST3K: Robot Wars, 20220507000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch ROBOT WARS (1993). A new SOL is introduced and a new Gizmonic tech arrives.

MST3K: Robot Holocaust, 19900113000000 +0000, After the ninth chapter of Radar Men From The Moon (1952) ends in technical difficulties, Joel and the bots must endure Robot Holocaust (1986). They pretend to be characters from the movie, but Tom Servo is the only one who is into it.

Lead with Your Heart, 20150919000000 +0000, When their parents contemplate splitting up, two teens hatch a scheme to make them realize how much they need each other. Stars Billy Baldwin and Kari Matchett.

Midway to Love, 20200626000000 +0000, When the network announces that her television therapy show is changing to a tabloid shock-fest, a caring psychologist returns to her hometown and reunites with her high school sweetheart. Stars Rachel Hendrix, Daniel Stine.
Nearlyweds, 20130112000000 +0000, Complications arise when three women (Danielle Panabaker, Jessica Parker Kennedy) learn that their marriages are not official.

Kitten Bowl IV, 20170205000000 +0000, The two Feline Football League teams that have cuddled and clawed their way to the top are set to go paw to paw to find out who will win the championship. Hosted by Beth Stern, John Sterling and Mary Carillo.
The Boys Next Door, 19960204000000 +0000, Four mentally handicapped adult men and their burned out social worker who must break the news that he is leaving.

The Flamingo Rising, 20010204000000 +0000, An eccentric dreamer infuriates the owner of a funeral home when he decides to build the world's largest drive-in movie theater across the street. Star William Hurt, Elizabeth McGovern.

The Courageous Heart of Irena Sendler, 20090419000000 +0000, The story of Irena Sendler, a social worker who was part of the Polish underground during World War II and was arrested by the Nazi's for saving the lives of nearly 2,500 Jewish children by smuggling them out of the Warsaw ghetto.
When Calls the Heart, 20130101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Maggie Grace stars as Elizabeth Thatcher, a cultured young teacher in 1910.

When Love Is Not Enough: The Lois Wilson Story, 20100425000000 +0000, Based on the true story of the enduring but troubled love between Lois Wilson, co-founder of Al-Anon, and her alcoholic husband Bill Wilson, co-founder of Alcoholics Anonymous. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Sateda
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E04, Exploring a village, the team is suddenly attacked and taken prisoner as Ronon had unknowingly lured the Wraith there. The villagers set Sheppard and Teyla free, who mobilize a strike force. When they return, the village has been devastated.

programme.title: Cloverdale
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E05, While exploring a new planet, Lt. Scott is attacked by an aggressive plant-like creature that infects him. Scott's circumstances turn dire and Tamara must search for a way to stop the alien infection from spreading while more creatures move in.

programme.title: Trial And Error
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E06, Col. Young (Louis Ferreira) is plagued by a recurring vision wherein Destiny is attacked and destroyed by aliens. After placing the crew on high alert, he starts to feel that he may be losing his mind and questions his ability as the commander!

programme.title: The Greater Good
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E07, When Destiny comes upon a heavily damaged ship, Dr. Rush and Col. Young decide to make a dangerous space-suited expedition to the ship. But an unexpected turn of events leaves Dr. Rush and Col. Young stranded aboard the strange vessel.

programme.title: Malice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E08, Lucian Alliance prisoner Simeon escapes, creating a manhunt on a remote planet. But Homeworld Command orders he be captured alive, believing Simeon has valuable information. Simeon must be brought back to the Destiny before he kills or is killed.

programme.title: Red Sky
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E05, The SG-1 team is welcomed on K'Tau by the planet's religious leader, who takes the reddening sky concurrent with their arrival as a sign from their gods. What he doesn't know is that the reddish color is signaling the planet's impending doom!

programme.title: Rite Of Passage
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E06, On the eve of her birthday, Cassandra is showing signs of mind fire, a powerful electromagnetic field triggered at puberty. Now SG-1 must find a cure to stop the life-threatening changes before she destroys herself…and the command center!

programme.title: Beast Of Burden
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E07, Daniel's Unas friend, Chaka (Dion Johnstone), is captured by a pre-industrial civilization that uses Unas as slaves. While attempting to free Chaka from this cruel regime, Daniel risks the safety of SG-1, and possibly the life of his friend.

programme.title: The Tomb
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E08, On a rescue mission to recover Russian soldiers believed missing in action on a previously undisclosed trip, the SG-1 team gets trapped in a Goa'uld tomb with a number of decomposed bodies…and a deadly alien monster with an appetite for human flesh!

programme.title: Between Two Fires
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E09, The SG-1 team returns to Tollana for the funeral of Chancellor Omoc, only to discover the rulers have reversed their policy on technology sharing and will now trade advanced weaponry with Earth. But is there a secret agenda behind the gesture?

Stargate SG-1, S05E10, SG-1 discover an opportunity to form an alliance with an advanced race who are willing to share their technology. They are the Aschen, the danger of whom the future SG-1 team warned about. Will the truth be revealed before it is too late?

programme.title: Desperate Measures
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E11, When Major Carter is abducted by a reclusive billionaire with nefarious plans that threaten her life, O'Neill and the rest of the SG-1 team must work with an old adversary to solve the mystery of her disappearance and bring her back alive!

programme.title: Wormhole X-Treme!
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E12, A ship headed for Earth is linked to the pod found through the alien Martin. Investigating what he knows, SG-1 finds Martin has become a consultant on a sci-fi series called Wormhole X-treme!, with a plot uncannily like the Stargate program!

programme.title: Proving Ground
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E13, Col. Jack O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and his new SG recruits have become the targets of a secret hostile takeover. Now it's up to a wounded O'Neill and his neophyte troop to save the command center from a possible alien invasion!

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E14, During a pursuit by the Goa'uld gliders, Teal'c fails to make it through the Stargate before it is destroyed. Now SG-1 has only 48 hours to reestablish Teal'c's energy signature from the temporary memory of the Stargate before it's erased…for good!

programme.title: Summit
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E15, A truce is declared among the Goa'uld, so that the warlords can attend a summit on the future of universe domination. As Jackson speaks fluent Goa'uld, he is sent to the summit disguised as an aide. But his real mission is to poison the delegates!

programme.title: Last Stand
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E16, Embattled and under siege, SG-1 attempts to escape a Goa'uld search and destroy mission bent on finding them and the secret crystal they carry. Meanwhile, the balance of life is threatened by the reappearance of the evil System Lord Anubis.

programme.title: We Interrupt This Program
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E17, Donna's stalker confesses and holds the entire staff of the TV station hostage.

programme.title: With This Ring
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E19, Brandon and Kelly each confess their feelings to friends, but expect the other person to make a move. Donna tries to reconcile with David. Steve and Clare double date with Ryan and his girlfriend.

programme.title: A Ripe Young Age
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E20, Donna and David visit her grandmother in San Luis Obispo. Noting a striking resemblance between David and her late husband, Mrs. Martin tells the couple about her romance with Donna's grandfather.

programme.title: Storm Warnings
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E21, Joey returns to the beach apartment. Rob irritates his manager by seeking Val's advice about whether to sign on for a new movie. Jim and Cindy invite Brandon to spend spring vacation in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Spring Breakdown
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E22, Brandon and Tracy visit Jim in Hong Kong; Cindy is in London helping Brenda cope with mononucleosis. Clare and Steve encourage Kelly to go out instead of moping around the apartment.

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E23, Mariah comes to town to give a lecture at the university's new age festival. She develops an instant connection with Kelly, prompting Tracy to bristle. David tries to plan a special evening for Donna.

programme.title: All That Jazz
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E26, Brandon has to take care of Kelly and Valerie, who are both laid up with the flu. The girls discuss the reasons for their feud.

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E27, Kelly learns that she is pregnant. Val makes a pass at David, prompting Donna to order him to end their working relationship. Clare is saddened by Mother's Day, so Steve tries to take her mind off things by going for a drive.

programme.title: The Way We Weren't
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E04, Brandon is heartbroken when Kelly is unable to remember their relationship. Valerie helps organize Donna when she has trouble keeping track of her clients. Donna decides to make Val her business partner.

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E05, Kelly moves back into the beach apartment. A designer offers to purchase Donna's work. David manages a rock band and allows the lead singer to crash at the apartment.

programme.title: The Right Thing
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E06, Brandon and Donna discover that Rush owns the building that houses the sweatshop. David's credit problems escalate. Kelly fails to identify the shooter from the police lineup.

programme.title: Pride And Prejudice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E07, Brandon's overprotection alienates Kelly; Donna learns she's been stabbed in the back by Valerie, who juggles her rich man and her poor man on a dinner cruise attended by Steve and Carly.

programme.title: Child Of The Night

Family Pictures, 20240810114100 +0000, Sylvie and Maggie are two strangers living on opposite coasts, leading very similar lives with husbands who travel for work too much and daughters about to leave the nest. But when their daughters befriend each other, a shocking secret emerges.

programme.title: Vacation, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E15, The Baywatch lifeguards set sail on a romantic cruise, only to encounter a dangerous fugitive, who forces Mitch and Stephanie overboard into the stormy Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Vacation, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E16, While on a vacation cruise, the Baywatch lifeguards encounter high seas hijackers, leaving Mitch and Stephanie stranded in the stormy Pacific, and Summer, Matt, CJ, and Guido faced with outwitting ruthless killers who have overtaken the ship.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E17, An escaped psychopath takes Summer and Stephanie hostage in a lifeguard tower, necessitating a thrilling subterranean rescue attempt by Mitch and Matt.

programme.title: Stakeout at Surfrider Beach
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E18, Mitch finds himself falling for an Italian actress who is being stalked by ruthless robbers. Meanwhile, CJ and Stephanie help Guido pretend to be a lifeguard in order to impress his visiting mother.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E19, When he risks his life to save three teenagers, Mitch fractures his spine and is paralyzed. Hobie, Stephanie, and Sophie, his physical therapist, rally to repair his shattered life.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E20, Paralyzed during a heroic rescue, Mitch undergoes a vigorous rehabilitation regimen. Meanwhile, Jason, a ten-year-old paraplegic, is pursued by a hitman trying to keep him from testifying against gangsters.

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E21, Mitch coaches Matt in an amateur kickboxing tournament, but the competition turns deadly when an enemy from Mitch's past gets him into the ring. Meanwhile, CJ, seduced by a fashion photographer, considers leaving Baywatch for a modeling career.

programme.title: Fatal Exchange
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E22, Mitch contends with an unorthodox, risk-taking Australian lifeguard, and rekindles his love affair with a beautiful journalist, Kaye Morgan.

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E01, Mitch's ex-wife flies in for a weekend visit. She introduces her new fiancé Ken and informs Mitch she is taking Hobie back to Ohio with her. When Ken's private jet crashes in the ocean on takeoff, the Baywatch team have to rescue them!

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E02, A dramatic plane crash finds Hobie and his mother trapped in the rapidly flooding fuselage beneath the sea while Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards mount a massive rescue effort to save the trapped passengers and crew.

programme.title: Lover's Cove
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E03, Romance is in the air at Baywatch as Mitch and Jackie's friendship grows more intense, Summer and Matt begin a relationship, and Hobie falls in love with Lauren, a junior lifeguard with a devastating secret.

programme.title: Blindside
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E04, John D. Cort, Mitch's friend and a former lifeguard, returns to Baywatch where his life undergoes a devastating change. Meanwhile, Hobie meets a very "unique" new friend.

programme.title: Skyrider
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E05, Summer has love problems when Slade returns from a world surfing tour to discover Matt and Summer are dating. CJ is persistently pursued by a bungee jumping balloonist. Meanwhile, Garner patrols the beach on horseback.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E06, A prison break gone awry finds Mitch held hostage by a beautiful woman and forced to perform surgery on her escaped convict husband. Meanwhile, Matt and Slade decide to settle their mutual affection for Summer in a daring surfing contest.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E07, Mitch removes a bullet from an escaped convict, only to realize that he and his wife have every intention of killing him. Stephanie's sister Caroline arrives with her fiancé, who becomes the target of an attempted murder.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E08, Mitch saves two boys from drowning. But when one ends up in a coma, Mitch suffers from PTSD and is left reevaluating his life as a lifeguard.

programme.title: Ironman Buchannon
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E09, Mitch's impending birthday prompts him to train for an ironman competition, getting swept off his feet by a younger woman along the way. Matt takes a night job to save money for a motorcycle, jeopardizing his coworkers through his exhaustion.
